title: Royal Mail 'could scrap Saturday post' as part of radical Ofcom overhaul

title: Tory plotters warned that May day coup against Rishi Sunak is 'too late' to oust the PM

title: Argentina’s unions pledge ‘total strike’ as Javier Milei pushes economic reforms
description: But he said that, though he held talks with Milei officials soon after the president took office last month, “nothing we agreed was reflected in the labour reform they suddenly presented, which breaks Argentina’s social contract”. Milei’s ...

title: General election poll tracker
description: R eform UK is now polling consistently in joint third alongside the Liberal Democrats amid anger at the Conservatives over their handling of illegal migration, The Telegraph’s tracker shows. Richard Tice’s party is holding on to a 10 per cent share of national voting intention, which puts it on an equal footing with the Lib Dems.

title: Laura Kuenssberg: What do voters think of party leaders? Not a lot
